accessory.name: Twilight-Star
accessory.description:
ATK/INT +5%

Before attacking, deals fixed damage equal to 1x of the unit's lower stat of either ATK or INT. If enemy is using mixed troops, this fixed damage cannot be immunized against.

accessory.name: Star-Earrings
accessory.description:
INT +8%

When Battling vs Assassins/Archers, DEF +30%

accessory.name: Goddess-Tear
accessory.description:
Healing Effects +15%

After taking action, dispels 1 debuff from 3 allies within 2 squares (not including this unit)

accessory.name: Eye-of-The-Beholder
accessory.description:
INT +8%

After attacking, 50% chance to reduce the enemy's damage dealt by 15%. Lasts 1 turn.

accessory.name: Draupnir
accessory.description:
INT +8%

When under ranged attack, reflect 30% of the damage taken.

accessory.name: Juglar-Plushie
accessory.description:
Healing Effect+15%

When using a single target Assist skill, effect duration +1.

accessory.name: Holy-Ring
accessory.description:
INT +8%

Immune to silence

accessory.name: Holy-Grail
accessory.description:
INT+5%

If this unit deals damage this turn, adjacent allies heal 15% of their max HP.

accessory.name: Angel-Feather
accessory.description:
HP +10%/Healing Effect +10%

Grants immunity to stun.

accessory.name: Vidar's-Rose
accessory.description:
INT +8%

When attacking, 50% to dispel 1 buff from the enemy. Works with AoEs.

accessory.name: Dimensional-Jewel
accessory.description:
INT +8%

When attacking with a skill, 30% chance to reduce Cooldown by 1. Works with AoEs.

accessory.name: Holy-Cross
accessory.description:
Healing Effect +15%.

When fighting against Demons & Mage units, INT/MDEF/DEF +20%. (Real Effect: Effective against Demons/Mage 20%)

accessory.name: Thor's-Necklace
accessory.description:
ATK +5%

After attacking, 50% chance to deal [1.0x Atk] as fixed damage after battle.

accessory.name: Elven-Ring
accessory.description: When Attacking, ATK/DEF +8%

accessory.name: Apex-Boots
accessory.description:
ATK +5%

Mobility +1

accessory.name: Winged-Shin-Guards
accessory.description:
ATK +8%

When attacked, DEF +10%

accessory.name: Lone-Star-Armlet
accessory.description: When there are no allies within 2 squares, during battle ATK/DEF +10%

accessory.name: Judge-Talisman
accessory.description:
ATK +8%

When Battling Against Holy Units, ATK +12% (Real Effect: Effective against Holy +12%)

accessory.name: Slayer's-Emblem
accessory.description:
ATK +8%

When Battling Against Flying Units, ATK +12% (Real Effect: Effective against Flyer +12%)

accessory.name: Overlord's-Badge
accessory.description:
All Stats +5%.

Immune to "DEF/MDEF Reduction, "ATK/INT Reduction", and "Mobility Down Reduction".

accessory.name: Insidious-Pendant
accessory.description:
All Stats +5%

When entering battle, CRIT +5%.

accessory.name: Heart-of-Gaia
accessory.description:
All Stats +5%

Immune to "Heal Reversal" and "Curse of Wounding".

accessory.name: Prisoner's-Gears
accessory.description:
ATK +8%

When battling against "Cavalry", ATK+12% (Real Effect: Effictive against Cavalry +12%)

accessory.name: Blood-Pact
accessory.description:
HP+15%

Immune to "Cannot be healed" and "Cannot Receive Buffs"

accessory.name: Swordsmith's-Medal
accessory.description:
All Stats +5%

Immune to fixed damage and silencing effects

accessory.name: Holy-Ark
accessory.description:
HP +8%

When attacked by melee, 30% of Damage Returned as Fixed Damage

accessory.name: Giant-Belt
accessory.description: When Attacked by Melee, DEF/MDEF +10%

accessory.name: Elven-Belt
accessory.description: When Attacked by Range, DEF/MDEF +10%

accessory.name: Spirit-Boots
accessory.description:
DEF+8%

Can move 2 Squares after dealing damage

accessory.name: Divine-Boots
accessory.description:
DEF +8%

Mobility +1

accessory.name: Veil-of-Light
accessory.description:
MDEF+8%

Immune to "DEF/MDEF Reduction"

accessory.name: King's-Amulet
accessory.description: When Ally is within 2 Squares, DEF/MDEF +10%

accessory.name: Speed-Boots
accessory.description:
HP +5%

Moblility +1

accessory.name: Meditation-Ring
accessory.description:
INT +5%

Immune to fixed damage
